Steps: 1. Open register.php 2. Fill mandatory fields 3. Submit
Expected Result: User stored hashed password, confirmation shown, redirect/login prompt

Steps: 1. Submit registration with existing email
Expected Result: Form displays "Email already exists"; no new user row

Steps: 1. Open login.php 2. Enter valid creds 3. Submit
Expected Result: Session created, redirect to homepage/dashboard, log entry created

Steps: 1. Attempt login with bad password 3 times
Expected Result: Error shown, account not locked (if not implemented), no session

Steps: 1. Click logout link 2. Access profile page
Expected Result: Session destroyed; redirected to login when accessing private pages

Steps: 1. Visit profile.php 2. Modify name/address/phone 3. Save
Expected Result: Data persisted in users table, success toast shown

Steps: 1. Open change-password.php 2. Enter old/new passwords 3. Submit
Expected Result: Old password validated, new hash stored, forced re-login

Steps: 1. Open donate.php 2. Fill form + up to 5 images 3. Submit
Expected Result: Donation saved with status Pending, files stored under uploads/donations

Preconditions: User has donations with varied status
Steps: 1. Visit my-donations.php 2. Review list and statuses
Expected Result: Table shows accurate statuses, admin notes, pagination works

Steps: 1. Open create-campaign.php 2. Enter details/items 3. Submit
Expected Result: Campaign stored pending approval; contributor sees confirmation

Steps: 1. Open donate-to-campaign.php 2. Select campaign item 3. Submit donation qty
Expected Result: Contribution recorded, campaign progress updated, success message

Steps: 1. From campaign detail, click volunteer 2. Fill skills/time 3. Submit
Expected Result: Volunteer entry saved, confirmation displayed, count increments

Steps: 1. Visit checkout.php 2. Confirm shipping/pay method 3. Place order
Expected Result: Order + items created, inventory decremented, cart cleared, redirect to order-success.php

Steps: 1. Open my-orders.php 2. Click order-detail.php
Expected Result: Data matches DB, timeline + tracking number shown, sensitive data hidden

Steps: 1. Login admin, open admin/dashboard.php
Expected Result: Cards show correct totals; charts fetch via api/get-statistics.php without errors

Steps: 1. Open admin/donations.php 2. View detail 3. Approve
Expected Result: Status becomes Approved, inventory entry auto-created, donor notified

Steps: 1. Open donation detail 2. Reject and enter reason
Expected Result: Status updates to Rejected, donor sees reason, no inventory change

Steps: 1. In admin/inventory.php edit item 2. Change price tier/status/visibility 3. Save
Expected Result: Changes persist, shop reflects new tier, audit logged

Preconditions: Admin logged in, order awaiting processing
Steps: 1. Open admin/orders.php 2. Change status from Pending to Shipped 3. Save
Expected Result: Status updated, timestamps recorded, customer notification triggered

Steps: 1. Visit admin/users.php 2. Edit user role to Admin 3. Lock/unlock
Expected Result: Role updates, locked users cannot log in, audit log entry
